item.description:
Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club is a four season outdoor activities and social club.  We hike, bike, paddle and party all over Boston as well as in the White Mountains near our year-round lodge.  In the winter, our members cater to their snow addiction, skiing, riding, snowshoeing, and cross country skiing all over New England!

We're a fun group but don't take my word.  Come see for yourself and meet up with us at Brighton Beer Garden for Happy Hour!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club vest---You can't miss the enormous logo on the back. Hopefully we'll be towards the windows...
item.why: Spring is in the air, Sam Summer is on tap, we have a lot of hikes planned in May, the Sox are playing, and there's bound to be a Boston playoff game on too! So come out for happy hour, meet some Wedelns & learn more about upcoming outdoor events!
item.name: Brighton Beer Garden Happy Hour--Get to know Wedeln!
